name: Purdy Nylon-Polyester Paint Brush Set - 3 Pack
description: The Purdy 1 in. Angled, 1-1/2 in. Angled, 2 in. Flat Paint Brush Set contains 1 all-purpose brush and 2 trim brushes, recommended for interior as well as exterior projects. The nylon-polyester bristles offer maximum paint lift with low drag.Nylon-polyester bristles provide smooth brush strokes and excellent overall coverageCan be used with all types of paint3 sizes to cover trim, touch-up and small-surface projectsDesigned for maximum paint lift and low drag for a smooth finishReusableIncludes a 1 in. angled, a 1-1/2 in. angled and a 2 in. flat brush
